summary: This mod adds the new crafting marker for exchanging 1000 gold coins to a goldsmith note.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=5]Goldsmith note[/size][/font]

[u][color=#ffff00][size=3][i][b]The new version is released.[/b][/i][/size][/color][/u]
This mod was remade completely. The new version is "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67504/?]Exchange currency[/url]".
Please exchange all goldsmith notes that you have to golds before uninstalling this mod.
[line]
This mod adds the new crafting marker for exchanging 1000 gold coins to a goldsmith note.
If you use a mod which gives the weight to a gold coin, this mod may be useful.
The crafting marker is placed at the counter in front of the general goods shop keeper in each big city.

Whiterun: Belethor's General Goods
Solitude: Bits and Pieces
Riften: Pawned Prawn
Markarth: Arnleif and Sons Trading Company
Windhelm: Sadri's Used Wares
author: uni_SL
